channel.title: Whonix Workstation CLI-15.0.1.5.4 - Automatic logon in the system at startup
channel.description:
Hello, I'm seeing that, when I start Whonix Workstation or I reboot it, by default it never asks me the credentials but it logons directly, even if I change user password.
This behavior is here from the beginning. I didn't install Whonix Workstation but I used .ova file and imported it to VirtualBox. In my opinion, directly logging on without asking credentials, make some security concerns.
In the Settings, I don't see any configuration for enabling/disabling the automatic logon. But this automatic logon was already enabled when I imported the .ova file on VirtualBox and continue to be also if I change password. It could be useful that, the released .ova have this option enabled by default.
Thank you in advance
